## Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the booklet for **"Generative AI"**. You'll learn;

-   **Basics and history of the development**
-   **Related Glossary**
-   **Different Language Models**
-   **Prompt Engineering concepts and more**

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This booklet is a collection of useful and up to date Generative AI related sources. The booklet starts with a general introduction about the history and some concepts first. Thereafter, various Gen-AI related terms or sources will be listed.
:::

## Credits

This book template is borrowed from [Hands-On Programming with R by Garrett Grolemund](https://jjallaire.github.io/hopr/) and inspired from different quarto books.
